name: Nofar Sarafian
about: Master student at the Department of Information Systems Engineering. Her thesis subject is Classification drivern predictive TIRPs Discovery

name: Maya Schvetz
about: My thesis subject is partially matched time intervals related patterns based classification, focusing on run time detection algorithm evaluation and improving classification results using partially match detection algorithms. The main database that I'm working on for my research is coming from the MIMIC III intensive care database focusing on the creation of specific cohorts of Sepsis acquired during ICU admission.

name: Guy Danielli
about: Thesis research about using committee diversity for active learning in Query by Committee. Project with IBM in JavaScript malware detection.
